Store Setup

Store Configurations
Payment Method

0 min
offering customers a variety of payment alternatives benefits both businesses and their customers customers can choose any payment method at the storefront depending upon the payment method conditions and availability of the method there are various benefits for customers who are presented with multiple payment options throughout the checkout process such as convenience, security, and affordability on the other hand, businesses encounter increased conversions, decreased cart abandonment, and customer loyalty
